title: League News: TFBlade wrongfully banned by Twitch

embed.description: https://www.twitlonger.com/show/n_1sqscn7?new_post=true Just heard back. I've been told that after you submitted your appeal, to be as objective as possible they had numerous people listen to the clip, and unfortunately they all also heard the N word. Even after asking to listen for idiots, they couldn't hear it.

body:
Since this is not being talked about much on the boards, I would like to bring to light the situation here.

Essentially, TFBlade uses the word "idiots" and Twitch thinks that he said the N word. They claim that they are unable to hear the word "idiots" and instead of giving him a 30-day suspension, they're "graciously" giving him only a 7 day ban. 

Honestly absurd on Twitch's half. Discuss.
